entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
